title: Grenade Launcher
summaries: The Grenade Launcher is a Hardmode, post-Plantera launcher that consumes rockets and launches a grenade with a timed fuse. The grenade explodes when the fuse expires, or if it comes into contact with an enemy. The Grenade Launcher has a (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 1/7 (14.29%) or (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 1/6 (16.67%) chance to be dropped from Plantera, and it is guaranteed to drop the first time Plantera is defeated (unless in Expert Mode(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions), where she drops her Treasure Bag instead). In addition, (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 50–149 / (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 20–49 Rocket Is will be dropped alongside the Grenade Launcher.
